name: steamserver
description: Posts the server address as steam connect url

description_localizations.en-GB: Posts the server address as steam connect url
description_localizations.en-US: Posts the server address as steam connect url
description_localizations.fr: Publie l'adresse du serveur sous forme d'URL de connexion Steam
description_localizations.es-ES: Publica la dirección del servidor como URL de conexión de Steam
description_localizations.it: Pubblica l'indirizzo del server come URL di connessione Steam
description_localizations.pt-BR: Publica o endereço do servidor como URL de conexão Steam
description_localizations.ru: Публикует адрес сервера как URL-адрес для подключения Steam
description_localizations.ja: サーバーのアドレスをSteam接続URLとして投稿します
description_localizations.ko: 서버 주소를 스팀 연결 URL로 게시합니다
description_localizations.zh-CN: 将服务器地址发布为Steam连接URL
description_localizations.zh-TW: 將伺服器位址發佈為Steam連線網址
description_localizations.pl: Publikuje adres serwera jako adres URL połączenia Steam

options.name: address_port
options.description: The server connection information in this format: [address]:[port]

description_localizations.en-GB: The server connection information in this format: [address]:[port]
description_localizations.en-US: The server connection information in this format: [address]:[port]
description_localizations.fr: Les informations de connexion au serveur sous la forme: [adresse]:[port]
description_localizations.es-ES: La información de conexión del servidor en este formato: [dirección]:[puerto]
description_localizations.it: Le informazioni di connessione del server in questo formato: [indirizzo]:[porta]
description_localizations.pt-BR: As informações de conexão do servidor neste formato: [endereço]:[porta]
description_localizations.ru: Информация о подключении к серверу в этом формате: [адрес]:[порт]
description_localizations.ja: この形式のサーバー接続情報：[アドレス]：[ポート]
description_localizations.zh-CN: 此格式的服务器连接信息：[地址]：[端口]
description_localizations.zh-TW: 此格式的伺服器連線資訊：[地址]：[連接埠]
